title: Walz criticized for ignorance of ‘what a venture capitalist does’: ‘Disqualify him’

description: The View co-host Alyssa Farah Griffin said she believes former President Donald Trump could “steal the election” and warned the current administration to “secure the Capitol.” “If he loses, do you guys honestly think this time he’ll take it like a man and just concede and move on?” the former White House staffer said on […]
title: Alyssa Farah Griffin warns Trump will ‘steal the election’

description: The United Auto Workers challenged former President Donald Trump to work a full 12-hour shift at an auto assembly plant following a knock the former president made on autoworkers. Trump recently claimed in a Bloomberg interview that auto workers simply assemble parts “out of a box.” Trump’s comment, which included him saying “a child” could […]
title: UAW challenges Trump to 12-hour workday following autoworkers slam

description: Vice President Kamala Harris did not bring the joy in her Fox News debut Wednesday night. In what was rightly billed as the most adversarial interview Harris has taken since becoming the Democratic presidential nominee, she seemed loaded for bear from the moment she sat down with Fox anchor Bret Baier. It was a sharp […]
title: ‘Joy’ eludes Harris in her high-stakes Fox interview

description: The Department of Transportation awarded five new round-trip flights at lawmakers’ favorite airport, thanks to a major aviation bill that Congress passed over the summer and President Joe Biden signed into law. American Airlines was awarded a San Antonio round-trip flight from Reagan National Airport, and Delta Airlines will now have a Seattle flight. Alaska […]
title: Five new flights named at Reagan after bitter fight in Congress
